sn35.32:1: "Sabbamaññitasamugghātasappāyaṁ vo, bhikkhave, paṭipadāṁ desessāmi. Taṁ suṇātha. Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, sabbamaññitasamugghātasappāyā paṭipadā?
sn35.32:2: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, cakkhu niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā"ti?
sn35.32:4: "Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā"ti?
sn35.32:6: "Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ: ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’"ti?
sn35.32:8: "Rūpā … pe … cakkhuviññāṇaṁ … cakkhusamphasso nicco vā anicco vā"ti?
sn35.32:10: "Yampidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā"ti?
sn35.32:12: "Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā"ti?
sn35.32:14: "Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ: ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’"ti?
sn35.32:18: "Rasā … jivhāviññāṇaṁ … jivhāsamphasso … pe … yampidaṁ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā"ti?
sn35.32:19: "Aniccaṁ, bhante" … pe … dhammā … manoviññāṇaṁ … manosamphasso nicco vā anicco vā"ti?
sn35.32:21: "Yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā"ti?
sn35.32:23: "Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā"ti?
sn35.32:25: "Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ: ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’"ti?
sn35.32:27: "Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rūpesupi nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati. Yampidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tasmimpi nibbindati … pe … jivhāyapi nibbindati, rasesupi … pe … yampidaṁ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tasmimpi nibbindati … pe … . Manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manoviññāṇepi nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati. Yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tasmimpi nibbindati. Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti. ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn35.32:28: Sabbañca dvepi pahānā,parijānāpare duve;Ādittaṁ addhabhūtañca,sāruppā dve ca sappāyā;Vaggo tena pavuccatīti.
